name: English
roles: Full Stack Developer | UX & UI Designer | Graphic Designer
design_and_multimedia_info: To elaborate design elements I use applications like Figma and Adobe XD to do my wireframes and mockups, Inkscape to make vector elements, Photoshop and Gimp to make illustrations, and Premiere Pro to make multimedia documents.
software_develop_info: To coding I use HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and Javascript to make frontend on my websites, PHP and Laravel to make backend and GitHub to save all project documents.
im_from: I am from Atenas, Alajuela, Costa Rica. Since childhood I loved draw different characters and design my own ones, also I appeared interesting the computation; for this reason I choosed a major related with design and software develop, because I think these are great complement.
im_student: I am a student at the University of Costa Rica (UCR), I study 'Informatic and Multimedia Technology', major focused on multimedia technology and how people can develop different applications with double perspective: designer and software developer
ib: Previously I studied on bilingual Palmares college, where I coursed International Baccalaureate Program.
i_speak: I speak my native language: Spanish. Also english in a intermediate level and french in a basic level.
subject: Subject
